title: Tesla Model Y Posts Worst Defect Rate of Any New Car in a Decade
description: If you just bought a Tesla Model Y, you may want to sit down for this. In Germany’s new TÜV Report 2026, Tesla’s best-seller finishes dead last for reliability among two- to three-year-old cars. Not “below average.” Not “needs work.” Last place, with a serious defect rate of 17.3 % in its first ...
titleSummary: "Tesla's Model Y Tops List for Most Defects Among New Cars in Years"
descriptionSummary: Tesla's Model Y has taken an unexpected tumble. According to Germany's TÜV Report 2026, this top seller ranks last for reliability among two- and three-year-old vehicles, with a significant defect rate of 17.3% within the first year of ownership.

title: Abarth Wants to Turn the Painfully Slow Fiat 500 Hybrid Into a Proper Hot Hatch
description: As you might recall, Fiat revealed full specs of its chic new Fiat 500 Hybrid a few months ago. The little hatchback oozes with charm and personality, which is what anyone expects from any European microcar. It's just started production in Turin, and there's a lot to like about it. Aside from the ...
titleSummary: "Reviving Italy's Icon: Abarth Tackles Fiat 500's Speed Sins"
descriptionSummary: Fiat's stylish new 500 Hybrid has been making waves since its full specs were unveiled earlier this year. This compact hatchback embodies the essence of European design, now rolling off the production line in Turin with plenty to admire.

title: Mercedes Is Killing the EQE Globally — But China Is Getting a New 2026 Model
description: The Mercedes EQE has been hovering over the chopping block for months. Reports out of Europe describe it as one of the casualties of Mercedes' reevaluation of its electric strategy. Demand for EVs has cooled, and the EQ family, with its rounded, futuristic styling, never quite clicked with ...
titleSummary: "Mercedes Bids Farewell to Global EQE Sales Amid Plans for a Chinese Revival"
descriptionSummary: Mercedes-Benz's sleek EQE electric car is facing an uncertain future after months of speculation. As the brand reassesses its electrification plans, insiders hint that demand for eco-friendly vehicles may have faltered, threatening the EQE's place in the lineup.

title: Ford Being Sued For a Missing F-150 Lightning Feature
description: One of the biggest investments an individual will ever make is the purchase of their own vehicle. Knowing this, any car buyer would want to get their money's worth with every purchase, especially after paying for the entire car. In today's world, cars are incorporating more and more features, ...
titleSummary: "Ford Faces Lawsuit Over Promised F-150 Lightning Capability Omission"
descriptionSummary: For many people, buying a car is a significant financial commitment that deserves careful consideration. To maximize value, it's essential to research and understand the features and benefits of each vehicle before making a purchase, especially considering the total cost.

title: Toyota and Nissan Are Using Chinese Tech to Reclaim China’s Market
description: The 2025 Guangzhou Auto Show underscored a dramatic reversal in China’s automotive hierarchy. According to a report from Sina, the long-standing joint-venture model, where global brands like Toyota and Nissan dictated technology while Chinese partners handled scale, has effectively collapsed. With ...
titleSummary: "Japanese Giants Turn to Cutting-Edge Chinese Innovations in Bid for Market Supremacy"
descriptionSummary: At the 2025 Guangzhou Auto Show, China's automotive landscape underwent a seismic shift. Global giants once dictating tech to local partners now find themselves playing catch-up as Chinese manufacturers assert their dominance in innovation and production capabilities.

title: Lexus LFA Successor Teased With a Toyota Badge and the GR GT Name
description: It's not something we talk about enough, but every time Toyota prepares to launch a new model, the whole automotive world sits up and takes notice. titleSummary: "GR GT Hints at Future of Toyota's High-Performance Line with Lexus-Like Flair"
descriptionSummary: When Toyota unleashes a fresh model, the entire automotive community leans in. But when it's a high-performance offering from Gazoo Racing, anticipation reaches a fever pitch. A tantalizing teaser campaign has just been unveiled.

title: Texas’ New Car Registration Rule Might Backfire Big Time
description: While California redesigned its license cards with security as the top priority earlier this year, Texas just changed its vehicle registration process, making it impossible to register a vehicle if you're not a documented American citizen. On paper, one of the least dangerous states to drive in ...
titleSummary: "Texas' Road to Ruin: A New Car Registration Law Takes an Unexpected Turn"
descriptionSummary: California took steps to boost driver's licenses with enhanced security features recently, while Texas overhauled its vehicle registration system, introducing stricter requirements that effectively bar undocumented citizens from obtaining vehicle registrations.

title: Crash Test Dummies Were Male for 50 Years, And Women Paid the Price
description: Research shows that women are 73% more likely to be seriously injured in head-on car crashes compared with men in the same crashes. The problem stems from a simple oversight that's persisted for decades. Safety systems have been designed around crash test dummies modeled after male bodies, leaving ...
titleSummary: "Male Crash Test Dummies Leave Women Vulnerable to Injury and Death"
descriptionSummary: New research reveals a startling disparity: women are 73% more likely to be severely injured in head-on collisions than their male counterparts. This alarming gap is rooted in a long-standing design flaw: safety systems based on outdated male models.

title: Bugatti’s Final Bolide Marks End of Roaring W16 Era
description: The 40th and final example of the Bugatti Bolide, the hypercar brand’s track-only weapon, has finally left the building. This has been a special yet challenging project for the company, as building a lighter, track-focused monster with the iconic W16 engine represented a massive shift in thinking ...
titleSummary: Bugatti Signals Sunset for Iconic W16 Engine with Last Hurrah in the Bolide
descriptionSummary: The last of 40 bespoke Bolides has rolled out, marking the culmination of a unique and ambitious endeavor by Bugatti's engineers. This radical departure from their typical grand tourers presented both opportunities and obstacles.

title: It Took 9 Months To Rebuild A Ford GT That Crashed In 2007
description: In 2007, just two years after it left the factory, a Ford GT was sadly crashed at a racetrack by the owner's friend, with the supercar spinning into a wall and clipping three of the four corners badly. When new, the car retailed at a $139,995 MSRP. In today's money, that works out to roughly ...
titleSummary: "Miracle Revival: Nine-Month Odyssey to Restore a Rare 2007 Ford Supercar"
descriptionSummary: A rare 2007 Ford GT suffered significant damage in a racing incident just two years after it rolled off the assembly line. Initially priced at nearly $140,000, its value has appreciated significantly with age.

title: New Ford Everest Is the Truck-Based 4Runner Rival America Still Can’t Buy
description: If one were to trace the roots of the Ford Explorer, it was essentially the SUV version of the Ranger, with a wagon-esque body added. It was actually capable off-road, and it came with pretty rugged underpinnings, thanks to its ladder-frame chassis. Today, the Explorer has become a crossover that's ...
titleSummary: "Ford's Latest Off-Roader Tries to Fill the Void Left by Toyota in US Markets"
descriptionSummary: The Ford Explorer's origins can be traced back to the Ranger, but with a station wagon-inspired design added for versatility. Its sturdy ladder-frame chassis made it surprisingly capable off-road at launch.

title: LEAKED: Genesis GV90 Will Arrive With a Limo-Style Coach-Door Version
description: Genesis is preparing the GV90 as its biggest and most ambitious SUV, and it’s shaping up to be the model that showcases everything the brand can do in the electric space. titleSummary: "Coach Door Luxury: Genesis GV90 to Offer Opulent New Body Style"
descriptionSummary: Genesis is gearing up for its largest and most advanced SUV yet: the GV90. Recent sightings have given us a glimpse of this electric behemoth's imposing stature and striking design features, including those distinctive swing-out rear doors.

title: Auto Loan Delinquencies Are Way Up, Making It Harder To Get A Loan
description: Auto loans are a good way to gauge the health of an economy. When the economy is healthy, interest rates are low, and borrowing remains strong. When things go awry, borrowing diminishes, and delinquencies creep up - which is precisely what’s happening. Auto loan rates remain above 7%; though loan ...
titleSummary: "Borrowers Struggle to Repay Car Loans as Defaults Soar and Credit Tightens"
descriptionSummary: A nation's economic vitality can be measured through its auto lending trends. Low interest rates and high borrowing indicate a thriving economy, while rising delinquencies signal underlying problems. The current rate plateau suggests economic woes.

title: Paul Walker’s 2005 Ford GT For Sale With 3,701 Miles And Ultra-Rare Spec
description: A 2005 Ford GT formerly owned by Paul Walker’s Always Evolving Collection is up for sale on Bring a Trailer, showing just 3,701 miles and finished in Mark IV Red without stripes, one of only 14 cars built in this specification. The GT remains one of the most ...

descriptionSummary: A rare 2005 Ford GT from Paul Walker's personal collection is now up for auction on Bring a Trailer, boasting an exceptionally low 3,701 miles and a striking Mark IV Red finish, one of only 14 produced without stripes.

title: Federal Agents Seize Ultra-Rare $13M Mercedes CLK-GTR Tied to Fugitive Kingpin
description: Federal agents have seized a 1-of-6 Mercedes-Benz CLK-GTR Roadster, valued at roughly $13 million, as part of a sweeping international manhunt targeting Canadian fugitive Ryan Wedding, a former Olympic snowboarder now accused of running one of the world’s most violent narcotics ...

descriptionSummary: A rare and highly valuable Mercedes-Benz has been confiscated by federal agents in connection with an ongoing global investigation into Ryan Wedding, a notorious suspect linked to a brutal international narcotics trafficking operation.

title: Mercedes-Benz's Answer To The BMW 4 Series For 2026 Looks Angrier Than Ever
description: In 2023, as part of a push to minimize the expensive exercise of filling every possible niche, Mercedes-Benz combined the E-Class and C-Class coupes, creating the CLE. titleSummary: "Bolstered C-Class Takes on 4 Series Rival in Aggressive New Design"
descriptionSummary: Mercedes-Benz has streamlined its lineup by merging the E-Class and C-Class coupes into the CLE model. As we approach mid-cycle for the CLE in 2025, an update is already on the horizon, with changes set to arrive in 2026.

title: Your Next Car is About to Face Brutal New Safety Tests
description: Earlier this year, the European New Car Assessment Program (Euro NCAP) said it would introduce an overhauled safety testing program that would require at least a few physical controls for key functions. This move is a response to overly minimalist, touchscreen-heavy car interiors that are, in some ...
titleSummary: New Cars Will Soon Be Put Through the Wringer in Toughened Crash Trials
descriptionSummary: The European New Car Assessment Program is revamping its safety tests to prioritize tactile controls, addressing concerns about the growing trend of minimalist, touchscreen-dominant car interiors that may compromise driver engagement and reaction time.

title: The One Place in California Where Drifting Won’t Get You Arrested
description: This new business venture in Sacramento is looking real good for California residents, specifically enthusiasts. We’re talking skid pads here, ladies and gentlemen, a dedicated facility located on Jackson Highway for legally burning rubber. Let’s get some things straight—we do enjoy slides, but not ...
titleSummary: California's Top Racing Spot: Where Speed Demons Can Let Loose and Thrive
descriptionSummary: A Sacramento-based speed enthusiast's dream is taking shape on Jackson Highway, where a purpose-built skid pad offers California residents the perfect outlet to indulge their love of high-performance driving while adhering to safety regulations.

title: Screen-Used 'Back to the Future Part II' Police Cruiser Could Sell for Over $100,000
description: A screen-used Back to the Future Part II police cruiser, one of only two ever built for the 1989 film, is now up for auction at Bonhams, where it’s expected to sell for $80,800 to $115,444. Designed by concept artist Tim Flattery and hand-built by legendary Hollywood ...
titleSummary: "Timeless Icon Hits Market: Classic Movie Car Expected to Fetch Hefty Sum"
descriptionSummary: A rare police cruiser from the 1989 film Back to the Future Part II is set to be auctioned off at Bonhams, with estimates suggesting a sale price of between $80,800 and $115,444.

title: Lotus Abandons All-Electric Plan, Shifts to Plug-In Hybrids Starting With the Eletre
description: It wasn't long ago that Lotus was talking about becoming a fully electric brand. The plan in 2021 leaned heavily on new factories, new architectures, and a clean break from the company's lightweight, analog past. The message at the time was that internal combustion engines were on borrowed time and ...

descriptionSummary: Lotus' former vision of a fully electric future seemed imminent just a few years ago. Plans called for innovative new factories and powertrains, signaling a major shift away from its heritage of lightweight, gas-guzzling sports cars.

title: Porsche Reveals One-Off Panamera With a Showstopping Bespoke Interior
description: True automotive luxury is never "you get what you see." At the upper echelons of luxury, individuality is about customers who seek to make personal statements or stand out from the rest. This is why major automakers offer bespoke, custom-made experiences for prospective buyers. In fact, if the ...

descriptionSummary: In the rarefied world of luxury automobiles, exclusivity knows no bounds. High-end manufacturers cater to discerning clients who crave not only exceptional vehicles but also personalized expressions that set them apart from the crowd. Tailored experiences await those willing to push the limits of bespoke automotive craftsmanship.

title: China's New PHEV Promises 620 Miles of Range for Just $36,000
description: BYD quietly launched the Atto 2 DM-i PHEV in Europe, a remarkable plug-in hybrid crossover also available as a pure electric. titleSummary: "Chinese Automaker Unveils Long-Range Hybrid at Affordable Price Point"
descriptionSummary: BYD has introduced the Atto 2 DM-i PHEV in Europe, a versatile plug-in hybrid crossover with an electric counterpart offering extended range capabilities through its dual power source setup and efficient fuel economy.

title: Over 143,000 Hyundai Santa Fe SUVs Recalled For A Safety Defect
description: It's been almost a decade since Federal Motor Vehicle Safety Standard 111 began a phased-in compliance schedule that mandated rearview cameras for vehicles with a gross vehicle weight rating of 10,000 pounds or less, but in 2025, several automakers have been struggling with the law. Among those ...
titleSummary: "Huge Recall Issued for Hyundai's Popular Santa Fe Models Due to Critical Design Flaw"
descriptionSummary: A regulatory deadline looms for auto manufacturers as 2025 approaches, marking nearly a decade since safety standards began phasing in rearview cameras for lighter vehicles. Several major brands face compliance challenges ahead of the looming cutoff.

title: 480-HP Art Deco Speedster Debuts With Carbon Body and Coyote V8
description: Restomods have become a whole scene of their own, with countless builders remixing vintage silhouettes into something more usable today. descriptionSummary: The restomod revival has given birth to an eclectic community of builders reimagining classic designs for modern roads. Amidst the abundance, a select few creations stand out, showcasing exceptional craftsmanship and style that's hard to ignore.

title: Senate Summons Detroit’s Big Three Over $50K New Cars
description: How much is the average price of new cars these days, you ask? It's now at over $50,000, which is a huge jump from about five years ago. It's mainly driven by EVs and the barrage of new models from luxury automakers, but the additional standard features are also a factor here. We're admittedly ...
titleSummary: Detroit's Iconic Automakers Face Congressional Grilling Over Skyrocketing Vehicle Prices
descriptionSummary: The average price of new cars has skyrocketed to over $50,000 in recent years, a significant increase from just five years ago. Rising demand for electric vehicles and luxury brands is partly to blame, along with enhanced standard features and model proliferation.

title: Audi Rolls Out Huge Tech Updates For Five Models—And Brings Back Buttons
description: Audi has announced several key hardware, software, and feature updates for five models. The group includes the A5, Q5, A6, A6 e-tron, and Q6-etron. descriptionSummary: Audi has unveiled a range of enhancements for its A5, Q5, A6, A6 e-tron, and Q6 e-tron models, with significant updates to hardware, software, and features across the lineup, initially targeting the German market.

descriptionSummary: Mercedes-Benz has unveiled its first public high-speed electric charging station at a Starbucks in Red Bluff, California, kicking off a national initiative to integrate fast-charging hubs into popular retail destinations along highways like I-5.

description: We now live in a world where automotive features and creature comforts are abundant. One of the most recent in-car tech that's becoming a fad these days is video streaming. titleSummary: "Ride-Sharing with Disney+: Audi Taps into In-Vehicle Entertainment Trend"
descriptionSummary: The modern vehicle has become a luxurious haven, with advanced features and amenities at our fingertips. One of the latest in-car luxuries to gain popularity is video streaming, allowing drivers to access their favorite entertainment content on the go.

Hey, legendary stylists such as Giorgetto Giugiaro and Marcello Gandini were juniors once. Over in Japan, Daihatsu, Toyota's ...
titleSummary: "Gen Z's Unconventional Vision for Tomorrow's Tiny Rides Takes Shape"
descriptionSummary: The future of car design is a mystery waiting to be solved by the next generation of automotive visionaries. As it was for style icons like Giugiaro and Gandini, youth will shape tomorrow's vehicles, with Asian manufacturers like Daihatsu already paving the way.

title: Land Rover Returns to Dakar With a Twin-Turbo V8 Defender Featuring ‘Flight Mode’
description: Any form of motorsport is tough, but when it comes to the ultimate test of man and machine, none come close to the Dakar Rally. It used to run from Paris to Dakar, but over the years, geopolitical issues and other factors have forced the rally to scale back a bit. In its current form, the Dakar ...
titleSummary: "V8 Fury Hits the Dunes as Land Rover Revives Dakar Dominance with 'Flight Mode' Beast"
descriptionSummary: The Dakar Rally is motorsport's ultimate proving ground, pushing drivers and their vehicles to the limits of human endurance and mechanical strength. Originally spanning from Paris to Dakar, it now takes on a different format due to changing circumstances.

title: The Aging U.S. Jeep Compass Isn’t Going Anywhere for Another Two Years
description: Jeep’s entry-level SUV occupies a simple role in the lineup, but its future in the US has been stuck in limbo. While Europe rolled out its all-new, Italy-made Compass this year, American buyers remain tied to the long-running generation that has been on sale for nearly a decade. The delay wasn’t ...
titleSummary: "Jeep's Aging Compact SUV Won't Get an Overhaul Till at Least 2025"
descriptionSummary: Jeep's compact SUV, once a straightforward choice, now faces uncertainty in the US market. The newer European model debuted recently, but American consumers are still waiting for an updated version of this aging design.

title: Nobody Wants Fiat’s Quirky SUV, So Dealers Have Slashed Prices By Over $14k
description: Fiat’s quirky but unsuccessful 500X crossover was killed off in late 2023, having last been on sale in the United States for the 2023 model year. Believe it or not, sales of the 500X have continued to trickle in this year (31 were sold in the third quarter), as the last few units to be built have ...
titleSummary: "Fiat's Oddball Crossover Stalls in Showrooms, With Steep Discounts to Clear Inventory"
descriptionSummary: Fiat's underwhelming 500X crossover met its demise at the end of 2023, marking a close to nearly four decades of sales. To some surprise, a small batch of these vehicles still found buyers in 2023, with 31 sold in the third quarter alone.

title: Tariffs Are Killing Any Chance of Kia's Pickup Truck Coming to the U.S.
description: There are heaps of cars that we wish were sold here, but regulations prevent that from happening for the most part. titleSummary: U.S. Market for Kia Pickup Truck Looks Increasingly Doomed by Trade Tensions
descriptionSummary: Despite favorable market demand, regulatory hurdles and escalating tariffs continue to restrict access to popular international car models in the US, thwarting automakers' efforts to capitalize on consumer interest.

description: A wildly modified 2007 BMW 328xi Sports Wagon, now powered by a Maserati 4.7-liter V8 and a Nissan CD009 six-speed manual, has landed on Cars & Bids with a current bid of $9,000. Finished in Sparkling Graphite Metallic and sitting on 19-inch Volk TE37SL wheels, the ...
titleSummary: "BMW 3 Series Wagon Transformed into a Rare V8- Powered Speedster with Unique Heritage"
descriptionSummary: A radical 2007 BMW 328xi Sports Wagon has hit the market, boasting an unconventional Maserati V8 engine paired with a Nissan six-speed manual transmission, and currently fetching $9,000 in bids.

title: New Boss 429 Looks Vintage but Drives Like a Modern Supercar
description: Ford built the original Boss 429 as a limited-production Mustang in 1969 and 1970, aiming squarely at the heavyweight end of the muscle car world. More than half a century later, Florida-based Revology has revived the Boss 429 name, but this time a bit differently. IN tradtional Mustang restomod ...
titleSummary: "Shocked to Speed: Retro Revival Meets Modern Muscle in the Latest 429 Masterpiece"
descriptionSummary: With its roots in Ford's iconic 1969-70 muscle car, the legendary Boss 429 has been reborn by Florida's Revology. This modern reinterpretation of the classic Mustang combines vintage flair with cutting-edge technology.

title: VinFast Faces Legal Heat After Owners Say Their EV Takes 24 Hours to Charge
description: One of the biggest pain points customers have when buying into the EV lifestyle is the battery charging time. With EV adoption still somewhat limited, automakers have been working to address this by offering more EVs that can charge quickly. One brand, though, seems to have dropped the ball in this ...
titleSummary: "Electric Dream Turns into Nightmare for VinFast Owners: Slow Charging Sparks Lawsuits"
descriptionSummary: One major hurdle for electric vehicle buyers is lengthy recharging times. To combat this, many manufacturers are developing faster-charging models, but some companies seem to be lagging behind in meeting this critical need.

title: Your “Worn-Out” EV Battery Isn’t Done—It’s Just Getting Started
description: When a dealer says an EV battery is degraded it’s, perhaps surprisingly, often still sitting on 70–80% of its original capacity. Research from the Union of Concerned Scientists puts that number right in the sweet spot. That is not scrap. That is a slightly tired athlete that no longer sprints, but ...
titleSummary: Reviving Electric: The Hidden Potential in Your 'Dead' EV Battery
descriptionSummary: Contrary to what you might think, an electric vehicle battery classified as "degraded" can still hold up to 70-80% of its original capacity, research suggests, leaving room for negotiation and potential reuse rather than outright disposal.

title: Mercedes-AMG’s New Electric GT 4-Door Is Shaping Up to Be Its Most Extreme Performance Car Yet
description: Mercedes-AMG is steadily peeling back the layers on its first ground-up electric performance sedan, the AMG GT 4-Door Coupe. descriptionSummary: Mercedes-AMG has begun lifting the veil on its all-electric AMG GT 4-Door Coupe. Following a series of extensive tests swathed in intricate camo wraps, the sleek performance sedan's design is starting to take shape under newer, more subtle concealments.
